metadata.name: Colored Passions #12

attributes.value: hand made doodle + Stable Diffusion + Procreate Retouch + Reframing

metadata.description:
The collection is a series of paintings that use vivid and expressive colors to represent different human passions such as love, joy, anger, sadness, and more. Each painting is a unique representation of the emotions and feelings that humans experience, depicted through the use of color.

The collection is heavily influenced by the theme of love, and each painting is a celebration of the many forms of love that exist.

AI + Digital Painting

Susan Calvin
